name: transterm2bsml
description: turns tranterm raw output to bsml

options.description: List of input transterm raw files.
Output bsml file. If compress_bsml_output is a non zero value, a .gz will be appended to the end of the filename if it does not already exist.
The input fasta file used as input to transterm.
A non zero value will produce gzipped output.
A valid id repository. See Ergatis::IdGenerator for details.
